name: Miranya Pazzle
description:
Have a good time playing our game Miraniya! Collect different shapes! Visit one planet after another, each planet is unique in its features! 200 unique, colorful and thoughtful levels!

How to play:

- Rotate the tiles to complete the shape.

- A shape collected in one move gives more points.

- More points - more stars!

- A piece collected in one move twice in a row adds one move.

- Get Miranha Coins for completed tasks and exchange them for additional moves.
